methods: abstract void addIdentity(Identity identity) Adds an Identity to this IdentityScope.
abstract Identity getIdentity(String name) Returns the Identity with the specified name or null if no Identity with the specified name is present in this scope.

Identity getIdentity(Principal principal) Returns the Identity with the name of the specified principal or null if no Identity with the name of the specified principal is present in this scope.

abstract Enumeration<Identity> identities() Returns an Enumeration over the Identity objects in this IdentityScope.
abstract void removeIdentity(Identity identity) Removes an Identity from this IdentityScope.
abstract int size() Returns the number of Identity objects in this scope.

static void setSystemScope(IdentityScope scope) Sets the system's scope.
